name: LakeViewMeta
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: LakeView-Meta (LVM) is an open-world metaverse, available on PC and Android, that combines multi-chain capability with P2E/C2E gaming, NFTs, staking, with future plans for a launch pad and more
